text: Richard Lamar Hawk (born January 22, 1998), better known as Silentó () or Prince Silentó, is a retired American rapper and singer. He is best known for his first single "Watch Me (Whip/Nae Nae)". The song charted at number three on the US Billboard Hot 100. On February 1, 2021, he was arrested in DeKalb County, Georgia and charged in the murder of his cousin, Frederick Rooks. == Discography == === Mixtapes === Title Album details Fresh Outta High School
